name: devto-netlify-starter
description: Skeleton of an HTML/Sass site that retrieves DEV posts with a Netlify function. Uses node-sass and includes Browsersync for hot reloading. Build styles are minified and autoprefixed.
author: 5t3ph

scripts.copy: npm run copy:js && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:img
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:img
scripts.develop: npm run copy && npm run scss ; npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run scss ; npm run css
